newsitem.title: USA: Kansas feedlot cattle trade $68, active - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Kansas feedlot cattle trade $68, active - USDA.

text.p: Trade active. Slaughter steers and heifers steady with last Thursday, USDA said.

Inquiry good, demand fairly good. Sales confirmed on 21,400 slaughter steers and 16,500 slaughter heifers Tuesday. For the week to date 42,400 head confirmed including 5,400 head or about 13 percent previously contracted or formulated cattle. Sales FOB feedlot net weights after 4 percent shrink.
Slaugter steers - Select and Choice 2-3 1075-1300 lbs, mostly 1150-1200 lbs 68.00; few Select with end Choice 67.00-68.00. Dressed basis - few Select and Choice 2-3 1200 lbs 111.00.

Slaughter heifers - Select and Choice 2-3 975-1140 lbs, mostly 1000- 1075 lbs 68.00; few Select with end Choice 67.00-68.00; mixed Commercial to Choice 1200 lb heifers and heiferettes 66.00. Dressed basis - pen Select and Choice 2-3 1075-1100 lbs 109.00-111.00.
Wk to date - 42,400 week ago - 31,300 year ago - 26,600
